Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs.​Acyclic
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs.Acyclic
DirectedGraphAcyclicBuilderUtils
internal static
DirectedGraphAcyclicBuilderUtils

Static utility methods for building instances of DirectedGraphAcyclic.

Functions
CreateDirectedGraphAcyclic
public static DirectedGraphAcyclic CreateDirectedGraphAcyclic(
DirectedGraph digraph,
GraphDepthInfo depthInfo,
out int[] newIdByOldId,
out int[] connectionIndexMap
)

Creates a new directed acyclic graph instance from the provided graph structure, accompanying graph layer information, and node ID mappings.

Parameters
digraph
DirectedGraph

A directed graph structure.

depthInfo
GraphDepthInfo

Depth/layer information, describing what layer each node of the graph is within.

newIdByOldId
out int[]

Returns a set of node ID mappings. These describe a mapping from the non-contiguous node ID space of digraph, to the contiguous node ID space of the returned DirectedGraphAcyclic contiguous space.

connectionIndexMap
out int[]

Returns a set of connection index mappings. The connections of digraph are re-ordered based on the layer/depth of each connection's source node; this structure conveys the new index of each connection given its original/old index.

Returns

A new instance of DirectedGraphAcyclic.

MapIds
private static void MapIds(
in ConnectionIds connIds,
int[] newIdByOldId
)

Creates a new directed acyclic graph instance from the provided graph structure, accompanying graph layer information, and node ID mappings.

Parameters
digraph

A directed graph structure.

depthInfo

Depth/layer information, describing what layer each node of the graph is within.

newIdByOldId
int[]

Returns a set of node ID mappings. These describe a mapping from the non-contiguous node ID space of digraph, to the contiguous node ID space of the returned DirectedGraphAcyclic contiguous space.

connectionIndexMap

Returns a set of connection index mappings. The connections of digraph are re-ordered based on the layer/depth of each connection's source node; this structure conveys the new index of each connection given its original/old index.

timsortWorkArr

A re-usable working array for use as temporary storage by the timsort algorithm.

timsortWorkVArr

A secondary re-usable working array for use as temporary storage by the timsort algorithm.

Returns

A new instance of DirectedGraphAcyclic.
